channel.title: Corporate Budgets on FinanClub

item.title: FTNT
item.description: score:325 Chances: Fortinet offers a range of cybersecurity solutions to various businesses, including enterprises, communication service providers, and small businesses, positioning the company to benefit from the growing demand for cybersecurity services. The release of new, integrated operational technology (OT) security solutions and services further distances Fortinet as an industry-leading OT security provider, potentially attracting more customers and driving revenue growth.
